title: Identity of Toddler Shot, Killed at Tampa Apartment Complex Released
content:
TAMPA, FL — The Tampa Police Department is continuing to investigate the shooting death of a 17-month-old girl.
According to the agency, a call about shots fired came in around 4:12 p.m. from the Clipper Bay Apartments, 6727 S. Lois Ave. When officers arrived on the scene, they learned Amaya Shafi had suffered a single gunshot wound.
The child was taken to a local hospital by her parents, but died from her injuries, a Monday morning email from the agency said.
Police have not released details about the shooting, but say no arrests have been made at this time. The investigation is ongoing.
Image via Shutterstock
